Articles.Content:
Hi again! I learned how to use GIMP so now these photos will be beta than ever! Lol JK.

I will make your photos better, and I will now work harder than before!

Give me details on what you want me to do to your photos!

Try 1:

Javascript is disabled. View full album

Try 2 Coming soon!

-DMSP

Edited March 30, 2015 by DMSP
Bump. And also there are some other photos in there, I was just showing what I could do.
You need to at least give credit for the pictures you didn't make. You probably also should have asked permission to use and alter before posting.

You need to at least give credit for the pictures you didn't make. You probably also should have asked permission to use and alter before posting.

I did... I said "Thank you Rarden for making such cool pieces of Art"

I made and took everything else...
Oh sorry, I guess I missed it. My bad!

Wow honestly these look terrible. This is the reason why cheap digital filters ruin everything. Instagram and Snapseed is a joke.

Edited February 9, 2015 by SpaceXray

Wow honestly these look terrible. This is the reason why cheap digital filters ruin everything. Ibstagram and Snapseed is a joke.

Well, why don't you make some photos... Sheesh, I have had enough of people who just give bad rep or post slightly hurtful comments on Imgur. I have never seen that on the forums before. I have gone through like 4000-5000 posts and this is the first one of its kind.

- - - Updated - - -

Oh sorry, I guess I missed it. My bad!

Don't worry, no harm was done, and you are so right, people should always cite or credit other people's work or quotes.

Edited February 8, 2015 by DMSP
Guys, are these bad? Be truthful...
The picture of Laythe in front of Jool is beautiful! I think this technique works best for planets . Coolio

The picture of Laythe in front of Jool is beautiful! I think this technique works best for planets . Coolio

Probably. I do like the 4th from last thought. "Drama in the night" because I used the drama filter...

It will take me 2 min to do the same in Snapseed, so yeah, nothing amazing here. Of course, everyone will be too kind to say the truth, but I will be completely honest. If you want to do something worth of praise, try:

1. Taking your own screenshots of YOUR ships

2. Learn how to use Photoshop, Lightroom or GIMP to hand-edit each one.

If you do that, your screens will look amazing.

P.S. I'm sorry if you took this the wrong way(no surprise there, very few can handle constructive criticism), but it is just a pain to watch Rareden's art get overlayed cheaply like that.

Think of something original and creative and keep trying!

Edited February 9, 2015 by SpaceXray

It will take me 2 min to do the same in Snapseed, so yeah, nothing amazing here. Of course, everyone will be too kind to say the truth, but I will be completely honest. If you want to do something worth of praise, try:

1. Taking your own screenshots of YOUR ships

2. Learn how to use Photoshop, Lightroom or GIMP to hand-edit each one.

If you do that, your screens will look amazing.

P.S. I'm sorry if you took this the wrong way(no surprise there, very few can handle constructive criticism), but it is just a pain to watch Rareden's art get overlayed cheaply like that.

Think of something original and creative and keep trying!

Well, this was only a trial... Plus, everything was mine apart from the 3 or 4 if Rareden's works. You're right, I need to close this.... Sigh...

- - - Updated - - -

Yeah, you're also right about constructive criticism. Sorry 'bout my outburst, but I had just come back from a bunch of people hating my stuff on Imgur because they "Didn't know". (Not this)

Closed at OP's request.

....and reopened at OP's request.

Edited March 30, 2015 by Red Iron Crown

The picture of Laythe in front of Jool is beautiful! I think this technique works best for planets . Coolio

I agree.
The last picture looks amazing
Got a pretty simple, darkish pic here. I'm not particular about how it turns out, but I do rather like the last pic in your album there, of the rover

Thank you guys, it's one of Rardens that I edited.

His photos rock.

I'll start working on the rover.

It looks great, DMSP!

I think you did a really awesome job.

Got a pretty simple, darkish pic here. I'm not particular about how it turns out, but I do rather like the last pic in your album there, of the rover

http://i.imgur.com/VXTRhqw.jpg

Here you go, I did two.

(The second is uploading).

- - - Updated - - -

It looks great, DMSP!

I think you did a really awesome job.

Thank you! If you have any photos you want edited just stop down here!

Nice MS art by the way, mine looks terrible

Edited April 3, 2015 by DMSP

Ok, still here.

I need a few more photos to make try 2.

Any requests that are submitted will be posted April 13-15.

Please submit photos however!
